CHAT.comment: STOLT-NIELSEN S.A., ET AL., Petitioners v. ANIMALFEEDS INTERNATIONAL CORP.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:02 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
ORAL ARGUMENT OF CORNELIA T.L. PILLARD ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF SETH P. WAXMAN ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONERS
(Whereupon, at 11:04 a.m., the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
